sentences.en: Aitken Extrapolation algorithm use Aitken transform to reduce iterations.
sentences.cn: AitkenExtrapolation 算法使用Aitken变换以减少迭代次数,但Aitken变换 在多数情况下无法确保算法收敛.

sentences.en: At the macroscopic level, an ideal gas is defined by a process of extrapolation.
sentences.cn: 从宏观角度看, 理想气体的定义是由推论而得来的.

sentences.en: C _ p and M _ n were obtained by kinetie extrapolation and GPC, respectively.
sentences.cn: C_p用动力学外推法求取, 分子量用凝胶渗透色谱法测定.

sentences.en: He estimate his income tax bill by extrapolation from figures submit in previous year.
sentences.cn: 他从前几年的报税数字推算出自己应缴的所得税数额.

sentences.en: His estimate of half a million HIV positive cases was based on an extrapolation of the known incidence of the virus.
sentences.cn: 他估计有50万个HIV阳性病例，这是根据已知的病毒感染率作出的推论。

sentences.en: In brief: one cannot reliably predict the rate of technological progress by extrapolation.
sentences.cn: 简单地说,人们不可能以外推法可靠地预言技术进展速度.

sentences.en: In itself, such extrapolation is hardly fatal.
sentences.cn: 就其本身而言, 这样的外推法并非是致命的.

sentences.en: Loss distribution was introduced to decompose extrapolation model to determine subsidy proportion.
sentences.cn: 将损失分布引入分解推算法中测算补偿比例.

sentences.en: Measuring static austenitic recrystallization by Back extrapolation method.
sentences.cn: 采用后插法来测定静态再结晶分数.

sentences.en: Most of was a bold extrapolation.
sentences.cn: 大部分是一个大胆的推断。

sentences.en: Rather, speculation, conflicts, and theoretical extrapolation typify their every action.
sentences.cn: 相反, 怀疑 、 冲突和理论上的推断是他们每步行为的特征.

sentences.en: The answer seems never appear through the judgement and extrapolation.
sentences.cn: 似乎永远不能在推理和判断里面出现.

sentences.en: The key factors influencing calculation precision are extrapolation methods and mesh size.
sentences.cn: 热点应力的外推方法、限元网格尺寸大小是影响计算精度的主要因素.

sentences.en: The underperformance of growth stocks is linked to an overenthusiasm for extrapolation.
sentences.cn: 成长型股票低于市场的回报被认为是与计算过度有关.

sentences.en: This kind extrapolation is worth deliberate.
